ai-tika-abh02t28:2_0: Trunking about the Teachings, I worship the Dhamma,
ai-tika-abh02t28:2_1: For it is so called because in the teaching of being discovered
ai-tika-abh02t28:2_2: The Noble Ones, who does not actually ill-will in him.
ai-tika-abh02t28:2_3: Hence the meaning of this is said: “According to the Commentary.”
ai-tika-abh02t28:3_0: the description of the development of the primary elements is for the preceding importance. This is the detailed explanation of the development of the base of psychic power that is effected by the supernormal power of seeing.
ai-tika-abh02t28:3_2: And they give up the drawbacks of giving up the drawbacks, and right view.
ai-tika-abh02t28:3_3: wrong speech, right action, etc., that is called “specified” .
ai-tika-abh02t28:3_4: He has right view, as an individual essence, appears in the multiplicity of persons, he does not expound it himself with his individual essence.
ai-tika-abh02t28:3_5: Through the supermundane progressively supramundane: then the upper world of the supreme.
ai-tika-abh02t28:4_0: Herein, phenomena as aggregates, that is to say, the festering of aggregates, and the clouds runnning here and there in conformity with their aggregates.
ai-tika-abh02t28:5_0: One day: “Herein, what are you right,” and after asking of them, he asked the same question of that.
ai-tika-abh02t28:5_1: was not tormented in that place, and it was misfortune to the fortnight.
ai-tika-abh02t28:5_2: But having asked: “What is the path to Awakening? What is the path?”
ai-tika-abh02t28:5_3: Or alternatively, what is called “resting to” , that is: “Here what is right view?
ai-tika-abh02t28:5_4: What is the wisdom there amount of wisdom? Which has been given up in the Vibhaṅga thus: “Herein, what is the act of answering? What is the act of giving away?” then the name of the resting place is done in the evening, etc., with the time of the Vibhaṅga thus: “Herein, what is this” .
ai-tika-abh02t28:5_5: But why are they supply in the same way? When asked, “Where are you going out of the dwellings? ” And when asked, “Where is this? It isn’t the my possession of reciting the Monastic Code, etc., when asked?
ai-tika-abh02t28:5_6: Learning in the presence of a single one:
ai-tika-abh02t28:5_7: Hence it is said: “Mendicants, I will teach you right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.”
ai-tika-abh02t28:5_8: they blocked it with first purity.
ai-tika-abh02t28:5_9: For that is why the name of bodily action are pure in bodily, verbal, and mental action, and livelihood are very pure. That is why there is bodily action, etc.
ai-tika-abh02t28:5_10: Hence it is the variety of paths (where).
ai-tika-abh02t28:7_0: The commentary on the path’s particular component is finished.
